name: Land of Dreams
description:
The Lost One awakens not knowing where she is or how she got there. Finding herself in a hut, an Old Woman tells she's in the Land of Dreams.

Join her as she tries to unravel the mystery of this new world!

This is a Mini Jam 105 game. The theme is Dreamy, with a limitation that every playthrough is unique. The team was made up of Mooshra and myself.

To move around, use the arrow keys. To interact, push the space bar. 

Thank you for looking at our game!
